title: How many times do you charge your phone daily? - Quora

response.answer_text: I have Samsung Galaxy A50 which gives a whole on single charge due to better optimization. In todays time many phone comes with very good battery capacity and top class processor in a budget but these companies forget to optimize the process for better battery backup and smooth UI operation. viz Redmi series, ralme series Only Samsung and Apple device give good backup though having less battery capacity than rivals coz they are very well optimized…

It depends on the model and battery capacity. If you have hogher battery capacity they willl last for more than a day for normal users. If you play more videos, then you need to charge it often.if you play games then is the same. Background apps take battery more
